statements: DELETE FROM speech_to_text_data WHERE language_code = 'en' AND transcription_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM model_training_data WHERE model_id = 2 AND transcribed_text = 'Speech data is important';
DELETE FROM model_training_data WHERE model_id = 1 AND audio_data IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM speaker WHERE speaker_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM speaker_profile WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM transcription_history WHERE transcription_date < '2021-01-01' AND transcription_accuracy < 0.8;
